sections.heading: supplies; discrimination; violation; penalty
sections.text: Any person, firm or corporation, violating any of the provisions of section 48-215, shall be guilty of a Class III misdemeanor. Each violation of section 48-215 shall be a separate offense.SourceLaws 1943, c. 114, ยง 2, p. 400;R.S.1943, ยง 48-216;Laws 1977,
